intro: Goldfussia pluriformis, commonly known as the variable goldenfussia, is a flowering plant native to the temperate regions of South America. Its showy, yellow-orange flowers bloom in late spring to early summer, attracting various pollinators such as bees and butterflies. Goldfussia pluriformis is often found in moist, shaded environments like woodlands and stream banks.
